item.description:
Khannnnnnnnnn! As in, Genghis Khan. Come see the award-winning (& 2008 Oscar nominee) foreign film Mongol, about the rise of Genghis Khan. From the trailers and reviews it's apparently a gorgeous, fairly high-budget epic, with a good bit of action. English sub-titles. We're going to the 7:40 show at the Criterion in downtown New Haven.

PRE-PARTY: Dinner in downtown New Haven 5:45. Location TBD. If you're interested, call or text me and I'll let you know the location. Feel free to vote a location, or cheap vs. mid-range price, etc.

HOST: Jason, cell 203-901-4957 (calling or texting is fine)

FREE STUFF: Criterion has a free "club" you can join that will allow you to buy discount tickets sometimes and earn free admissions, etc. Worth joining if you're ever going back.

PARKING: Sunday street parking is free, but if you don't find any, Temple Garage across the street is 24 hr, and Criterion will give you a validation stub (if you ask) which will allow you to park there a LONG time for $3.
item.name: Sun. 6/22 - Mongol at Criterion Cinema, + dinner
